text: kokatath kollo denna dan iskole yana eke oyath poddak ee panthiyakawath gihin ath akuru hada gaththoth hondayi neda?"bindu mama wihiluwata wage kiwawath ithin kathawa nam amulika aththa :) :) :) kohoma wethath ape thaththage ingrisi akuru echcharama awulak naha sinhala akuru thama awula.

wasara 1815 di mahanuwara rajadhaniye palanaya ingirasin athata pathwimath samaga, dalada puda pujawan da dalada perahara mangalyayada abhimanawathwa pawathwa ganimata haki wuye natha. 1828 wasara awasanaye sitama wasi rahitha kalayak arambaiya.

hama thanama thanakola.rata thanakola.eya kiwwe rata nisa gawunath mara sanipayi kiyala.api waththe okkoma gas ugullala aluthin rata thanakola wawanna patan aragaththa.ape gedara podi wunata thattu dekak thiyenawa.udama thattuwa alutha bandapu thalagoyi kapal ehekata rent awut karala thiyenne.apita hiriharayak na.mase anthimata salli ganna giyama thama tikak karadara.eeth eya dannawa karadara aduwen salli tika araganna.eya issara giye kolaniya kolaba bas eke wadata.passe tayi dagena bas eke yanna bamaya kiwwa nisa lis karala marutiyak aragaththa.eya 5”7 yi kesangayi.lahipite parana badu wikunana kotasath ekka ena mangala danwim wala pihiten thama amma eyawa hoyagena thibbe.surawen thora wunata eya biyar bonawa.indala hitala langin la arakku gandak enawa.mama “biwwada?”
